description: My place is close to The Queens Kickshaw, Kaufman Astoria Studios, Monikas Cafe Bar, Rèst-âü-Ránt, and Malagueta Restaurant. You’ll love my place because of its size.  It is also bright and tidy, the perfect place to come and relax. . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Immaculate & Spacious Home - Astoria, Queens
review: Awesome stay in a great apt. Lydia is a great host, super friendly and easy to communicate with.  The place is just as described. Definitely recommend staying here!
